column4: There's a set time to get into the BIOS before the boot splash shows up.

XP and Ubuntu. Though this computer will be wiped clean soon and have Xubuntu installed on it... or Kubuntu.

I know it takes time. :P I mean what do I do to kickstart the fluxbox config?
log out of your current session, and switch to 'fluxbox' in the sessions menu of the login screen
